articles.title: Could COVID-19 immunity last decades? Here’s the science. - Livescience.com
articles.content: The body builds a protective fleet of immune cells when infected with COVID-19, and in many people, those defenses linger for more than six months after the infection clears, according to a new study… [+6967 chars]
